doc.after: Within the last century philosophy has increasingly become a professional discipline practiced within universities like other academic disciplines Accordingly it has become less general and more specialized In the view of one prominent recent historian Philosophy has become a highly organized discipline done by specialists primarily for other specialists The number of philosophers has exploded the volume of publication has swelled and the subfields of serious philosophical investigation have multiplied Not only is the broad field of philosophy today far too vast to be embraced by one mind something similar is true even of many highly specialized subfields 83
